summary: Adds the Dagger of Xian to the game (user requested mod)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://666kb.com/i/c9juf9a1n56cpb9df.png[/img][/center]

[b]Dagger of Xian[/b]

This mod is a user request. Shape, textures,weapon stats and type as requested, thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/846120-dagger-of-xian/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/846120-dagger-of-xian[/url]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Open the downloaded archive, drop the whole content to ...Skyrim\\data\\
It should look like:
...Skyrim\\data\\meshes\\weapons\\xian\\ NIF FILES
...Skyrim\\data\\textures\\weapons\\xian\\ DDS FILES
...Skyrim\\data\\Dagger of Xian.ESP

Ensure that the mod is activated in your launcher\'s DATA FILES (should be by default)
This mod requires Skyrim version 1.8+ , if you use an older/pirated/\"non-steam\" version it won\'t work = item invisible or not available at all.

Forge: Steel items 
OR
Open console, enter HELP XIAN, remember the displayed code next to the item, enter 
PLAYER.ADDITEM code 1
1 = quantitiy

Craftable,improveable,follower friendly.

[b][center]THIS WAS JUST A QUICK JOB FOR A SINGLE PERSON, I\'M SHARING IT TO THE PUBLIC IN CASE SOMEONE ELSE WANTS TO USE IT AS WELL. 
THERE WON\'T BE ANY UPDATES, FINETUNING OR WHATEVER SINCE THIS IS NOT A MAJOR PROJECT OF MINE.[/b][/center]

greetings
Ghosu
author: Ghosu
